scripts.css:build: npm run css:ui & npm run css:helpers & npm run css:pages
scripts.css:pages: npm run css:business && npm run css:dashboard & npm run css:error-pages & npm run css:landing-page & npm run css:login-page & npm run css:movie-app & npm run css:pricing-table & npm run css:product-listing & npm run css:sign-up-page
scripts.js:build: npm run js:ui & npm run js:helpers & npm run js:pages
scripts.js:ui: rollup js/ui.js --file dist/js/ui.js & babel dist/js/ui.js --out-file dist/js/ui.js --no-comments
scripts.js:helpers: npm run js:classnames & npm run js:iconlist
scripts.js:classnames: rollup js/helpers/classnames.js --file dist/js/classnames.js & babel dist/js/classnames.js --out-file dist/js/classnames.js --no-comments
scripts.js:iconlist: rollup js/helpers/iconlist.js --file dist/js/iconlist.js & babel dist/js/iconlist.js --out-file dist/js/iconlist.js --no-comments
scripts.js:pages: npm run js:business && npm run js:dashboard & npm run js:landing-page & npm run js:product-listing & npm run js:real-estate-details & npm run js:javascript
scripts.js:business: rollup js/pages/business.js --file dist/js/business.js & babel dist/js/business.js --out-file dist/js/business.js --no-comments
scripts.js:dashboard: rollup js/pages/dashboard.js --file dist/js/dashboard.js & babel dist/js/dashboard.js --out-file dist/js/dashboard.js --no-comments
scripts.js:landing-page: rollup js/pages/landing-page.js --file dist/js/landing-page.js & babel dist/js/landing-page.js --out-file dist/js/landing-page.js --no-comments
scripts.js:product-listing: rollup js/pages/product-listing.js --file dist/js/product-listing.js & babel dist/js/product-listing.js --out-file dist/js/product-listing.js --no-comments
scripts.js:real-estate-details: rollup js/pages/real-estate-details.js --file dist/js/real-estate-details.js & babel dist/js/real-estate-details.js --out-file dist/js/real-estate-details.js --no-comments
scripts.js:javascript: rollup js/pages/javascript.js --file dist/js/javascript.js & babel dist/js/javascript.js --out-file dist/js/javascript.js --no-comments
scripts.icon:build: npm run icon:svgo & npm run icon:sprite
scripts.icon:svgo: npm run icon:brands & npm run icon:commerce & npm run icon:files & npm run icon:general & npm run icon:kitchen & npm run icon:media & npm run icon:real-estate & npm run icon:social & npm run icon:touch & npm run icon:weather
